page.title: 11EDUCATION-SCHOOL LIFE
page.content: In our school we have three areas and they have all got names.The first area is called the yellow area,the second area is called the red area and the third area is called the green area. The green area is the infant area.I used to be an infant but now I am a junior.When I was an infant we did 'story'-our teacher would write it down for us while we told her what to write and when she had finished we used to copy it out.Then we had to draw a picture.Now I am a 3rd year junior and our tests we do each year get harder because we do subjects like History,Geography and Science.These subjects are when we study things and do experiments and write down what we have recorded.After I am a 4th year junior I will go to another school and do harder work and I will have to do a lot of homework.
